name: Hops 2
description:
Hops II

This Game is a remake of the first game I made without a gamecourse, by searching tutorials all over the place. 

Back then it took me about 2 weeks to create this.  This time I made it in 2.5 days without looking a single tutorial.

I hope you like a simple platformer.

FSK 0

This Game is made with assets from the Assetstore.

Goldemedal

PotionAudio

Unity 2021.3.11f LTS
